channel.title: Failed to import appliance on Virtual Box Result Code: E_INVALIDARG (0x80070057)
channel.description:
Hi there, So i tried to take every steps, even after trying to re-install Virtualbox but it still give me the same notice when reaching full finish of the appliance which written below: Failed to import appliance **D:\New folder (2)\Whonix-XFCE-16.0.5.3.ova**.
Result Code: E_INVALIDARG (0x80070057) Does anybody has the same problem? Please give me some advices! Thank you so much!

item.title: Failed to import appliance on Virtual Box Result Code: E_INVALIDARG (0x80070057)
item.dc:creator: kensingtonxoxo
item.description:
Thank you so much for the support!
I managed to apply Whonix, it happens to be a low disk problem.

Read full topic
